price: Yusuf akasema: Ee Mola Mlezi wangu! Nastahabu kifungo kuliko haya anayo niitia. Na usipo niondoshea vitimbi vya wanawake mimi nitamili kwao, na nitakuwa katika wajinga.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱلسِّجۡنُ أَحَبُّ إِلَيَّ مِمَّا يَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَيۡهِۖ وَإِلَّا تَصۡرِفۡ عَنِّي كَيۡدَهُنَّ أَصۡبُ إِلَيۡهِنَّ وَأَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
footnotes: Yusuf akasema naye alisikia vile vitishio, na akasikia kwa wale wanawake nasiha ya kuwa amkubalie, akasema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Nakhiari kifungo kuliko hayo anayo nitakia huyu mwanamke. Kwani hayo ni kukuasi Wewe. Na kama Wewe hunikingi na shari ya vitimbi vyao na hila zao nitakuja wakubalia, na nitakuwa miongoni mwa wajinga walio potea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi al-sij'nu aḥabbu ilayya mimmā yadʿūnanī ilayhi wa-illā taṣrif ʿannī kaydahunna aṣbu ilayhinna wa-akun mina al-jāhilīna
